org.hms
This package contains the main classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).

This package contains the entity classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).

Provides services related to medical records.

This package contains the view classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).

    class 
    PatientContext
    The PatientContext class extends the UserContext to provide additional context specific to a patient by incorporating a patientID.

    PatientContext(UserContext userContext, String patientID)
